text: Kirkandrews (also known as Kirkandrews-on-Esk distinguishing it from Kirkandrews-on-Eden), is a civil parish in City of Carlisle district, Cumbria, England. At the 2011 census it had a population of 493. The parish is bordered to the west and north by Dumfries and Galloway, Scotland; to the north east by Nicholforest, and to the south by Arthuret. The area of the parish is . There is a parish council, the lowest tier of local government. ==Listed buildings== there are 13 listed buildings in the parish, of which three are at grade II* and the others at grade II. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Civil parishes in Cumbria Category:City of Carlisle
title: Kirkandrews-on-Esk
